title: 'Striking' new artwork for UK trains revealed - as MPs debate rail nationalisation
description: A new design for publicly owned trains is to be revealed, ahead of MPs debating rail nationalisation on Tuesday.
content:
A "striking" new design for UK trains has been revealed by the transport secretary - but you may well think it looks familiar.
Train services already in public ownership will begin to adopt a Union flag-inspired design from this spring, Heidi Alexand... [3089 chars]

title: Maternity care failings 'much worse' than anticipated, says head of national review
description: An interim report by Baroness Amos finds poor care and dirty wards are blighting England’s maternity services.
content:
Hungry mothers, dirty wards and poor care are blighting England's maternity services while staff receive death threats for working in some units, according to a new report.
Baroness Amos, who is chairing a review into maternity care, said that what s... [4255 chars]

title: Hungry mothers on dirty wards, finds ongoing maternity review
description: Poor care is ingrained on England's maternity wards, says chair of national investigation.

title: Trump gives Nvidia the OK to sell advanced AI chips to China
description: Nvidia had been at the centre of a geopolitical tug-of-war between the US and China in recent months.
content:
US President Donald Trump has announced that he will allow AI chip giant Nvidia to sell its advanced H200 chips to "approved customers" in China.
"We will protect National Security, create American Jobs, and keep America's lead in AI," Trump said on ... [3005 chars]

title: Powerful earthquake in northern Japan triggers tsunami, injuring 33
description: A 7.5-magnitude earthquake has hit off the northeastern coast of Japan, unleashing a tsunami of up to 70cm.
content:
A powerful earthquake struck off northern Japan, injuring 33 people and unleashing a tsunami.
The 7.5-magnitude quake struck at about 11.15pm local time, around 80 kilometers off the coast of Aomori prefecture.
Japan's Fire and Disaster Management Ag... [2212 chars]
